ygData.subject: PVP & PK+
ygData.msgSnippet: While the priest of discord is about - switching from a blue to red is easy. A /petition as it might undo a mistake, doesn t seem to allow one to go back to
ygData.messageBody:
While the priest of discord is about - switching from a blue to red is easy.

A /petition as it might undo a mistake, doesn't seem to
allow one to go back to PK-.

While I have asked around both ingame and out, there
was hint of a quest to restore one's Blue status.
BTW: I still have my Tome in hand should a GM consider
the situation.

Long story short - A cleric can't HEAL or COURAGE since
Blue's have protection from _all_ PK+ Spells.

Offensive vs "helpful" I can understand, but it makes less
since when a Party of Blues has a Red spell slinger.

Thoughts?

Cleric Taven (Veeshan)
